title: A fatal error has occured, this connection is terminated
author: 一条鱼乾
txt_content:
玩家有时进入服务器会显示
 A fatal error has occured, this connection is terminated
但是重启服务器又不会出现此问题当玩家进入时出现A fatal error has occured, this connection is terminated时后台会报错
15.02 23:23:05 [服务器] 位置: com.ilummc.valkyrie.f.run(h:520) ~[f.class:?]15.02 23:23:05 [服务器] 位置: cpw.mods.fml.common.network.FMLEventChannel.sendTo(FMLEventChannel.java:139) ~[FMLEventChannel.class:1.7.10-R0.1-SNAPSHOT]15.02 23:23:05 [服务器] 位置: io.netty.channel.AbstractChannel.writeAndFlush(AbstractChannel.java:239) ~[AbstractChannel.class:?]15.02 23:23:05 [服务器] 位置: io.netty.channel.DefaultChannelPipeline.writeAndFlush(DefaultChannelPipeline.java:893) ~[DefaultChannelPipeline.class:?]15.02 23:23:05 [服务器] 位置: io.netty.channel.DefaultChannelHandlerContext.writeAndFlush(DefaultChannelHandlerContext.java:717) ~[DefaultChannelHandlerContext.class:?]15.02 23:23:05 [服务器] 位置: io.netty.channel.DefaultChannelHandlerContext.writeAndFlush(DefaultChannelHandlerContext.java:688) ~[DefaultChannelHandlerContext.class:?]15.02 23:23:05 [服务器] 位置: io.netty.channel.DefaultChannelHandlerContext.write(DefaultChannelHandlerContext.java:698) ~[DefaultChannelHandlerContext.class:?]15.02 23:23:05 [服务器] 位置: io.netty.channel.DefaultChannelHandlerContext.invokeWrite(DefaultChannelHandlerContext.java:644) ~[DefaultChannelHandlerContext.class:?]15.02 23:23:05 [服务器] 位置: cpw.mods.fml.common.network.FMLOutboundHandler.write(FMLOutboundHandler.java:262) ~[FMLOutboundHandler.class:1.7.10-R0.1-SNAPSHOT]15.02 23:23:05 [服务器] 位置: cpw.mods.fml.common.network.FMLOutboundHandler$OutboundTarget$4.validateArgs(FMLOutboundHandler.java:102) ~[FMLOutboundHandler$OutboundTarget$4.class:1.7.10-R0.1-SNAPSHOT]15.02 23:23:05 [服务器] 严重错误 There was a critical exception handling a packet on channel valkyrie1.1

服务器mod有更多食物、NPC、精英怪、竹
求如何解决

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content: 升级你的valkyrie试试   或者换成 http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-778861-1-1.html

replies.author: rong200309
replies.txt_content: 我也遇到过== 这个检测插件 客户端启动方式的问题 用HLMC启动器没发现再出现问题
